snippet.title: Platypus Reclayed - Teaser Trailer
snippet.description:
22 years after its first appearance, the iconic indie shoot ‘em up Platypus is coming back, better than ever!

Wishlist: https://steampowered.com/app/2912430
Twitter: https://twitter.com/ClaymaticGames

Yes. The original developer Anthony Flack is involved, and we'll also be releasing on consoles!
